events.name: GDG Sanaa DevFest 2017
events.description:
GDG Sanaa DevFest 2017 is our annual all-day developer event that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more!

31/08/2017
8:00 - 9:00 AM Registration & Welcome Coffee
9:00 - 10:00 AM Introduction to Firebase
10:00 - 10:30 AM Break
10:30 - 11:30 AM Introduction to PWA
11:30 - 12:30 AM What's new on Android
12:30 - 1:30 PM Lunch Time
1:30 - 3:00 PM PWA Codelab
3:00 - 3:30 PM Coffee Break
3:30 - 4:30 PM PWA Codelab (Cont...)
4:30 - 5:00 PM Closing Remarks (Q&A)

02/09/2017
== Firebase AppFest ==

Content Plan

##Sessions that are useful to all DevFest attendees - presented by Firebase Team

9-10am : Intro to Firebase/Zero to App (An introduction to Firebase + recap of what is new since I/O)

10-11am : What you can build with Cloud Functions

##Hackathon starts

11am-12pm : Hackathon kick-off (how does this work? where do you start? what do you build?)

12-5pm : Hack on your own with help from the mentors

5-6pm : Judging and prizes (winners and runner up showcase)

Â 

==========>> Registration form will be available on August 10th

3- Accepted applicants will be contacted and informed by email or mobile phone.
4- You will need a maximum of 20 minutes to answer this registration form.

events.name: Cloud Study Jam Sana'a
events.description:
â€¢ What we'll do
Organizing Cloud Study Jam for 25 developers.

* Agenda for 25 people :
Welcome speech || 02:00 - 02:30
Complete three GCP Essentials labs together. || 02:30 - 04:00
Break || 04:00 - 04:30
Complete fourth lab together. || 04:30 - 06:00 ### At home tasks:
- 1 -
Complete the remaining four GCP Essentials labs to earn a badge and an additional month of free Qwiklabs access!
-2-
Use your free access to learn and earn badges in Kubernetes, Scientific Data Processing, Deployment Manager, Cloud Architecture, Developing Applications, Data Engineering, or Windows on GCP. You choose!
-3-
Share your progress with fellow attendees online.
(The online channel for the group will be announce soon).

â€¢ What to bring
#Bring your laptop -- Mac, PC, Chromebook, Linux, everyoneâ€™s welcome.
#Bring your laptop charger.
#The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.
#Create a Qwiklabs account at https://google.qwiklabs.com/users/sign_up Make sure you check the opt-in box for promos! That makes you eligible for additional free access after you complete the first series of labs.

events.name: DevFest Sana'a 2018
events.description:
DevFest Sana'a 2018 is our annual all-day developer event that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas and codelabs and more!

== Agenda ==
Registration >> 08:00 - 09:00
Welcome Speech >> 09:00 - 09:15
Flutter >> 09:15 - 10:30
Break >> 10:30 - 11:00
Machine Learning >> 11:00 - 12:00
Introduction to Blockchain >> 12:00 - 01:30
Lunch Break >> 01:30 - 02:00
Android System Source >> 02:00 - 03:30
Q&A Closing Remarks >> 03:30 - 03:45

##PLEASE NOTE THAT:
1- This event is for developers (programmers) ONLY. If you are not a programmer or a developer please don't register.
2- Most of the event will be in English, so you must have the ability to understand English.
3- Accepted applicants will be contacted and informed by email or mobile phone.
4- You will need a maximum of 20 minutes to answer this registration form.

events.name: DevFest onAir
events.description:
On behalf of Google and Google's developers program, weâ€™re excited to announce the first official DevFest OnAir!

DevFest OnAir is an online conference featuring sessions from DevFest events around the globe. These community-led developer sessions are hosted by GDG (Google Developer Groups) focused on community, networking and learning about Google technologies. With over 500 communities and DevFest events happening all over the world, DevFest OnAir brings this global experience online for the first time!

Exclusive content.
DevFest OnAir includes exclusive content from Google. Switch between three separate tracks: Cloud; Mobile; Voice, Web & more. Sessions cover multiple products such as Android, Google Cloud Platform, Firebase, Google Assistant, Flutter, machine learning with TensorFlow, and mobile web.

Tailored to your time zone.
Anyone can join, no matter where you are. Weâ€™re hosting three broadcasts around the world, around the clock, so thereâ€™s a convenient time for you to join no matter where you are at home or at work.

Ask us a question live.
Our live Q&A forum will be open throughout the online event to spark conversation and get you the answers you need.

Fun!
Join the fun with interactive trivia during DevFest OnAir where you can receive something special! Every participant will receive one free month of learning on Qwiklabs.

AGENDA:
https://goo.gl/6RYt4j

You can register using below link
https://devfest.withgoogle.com/events/devfestonair18
